lead_paragraph: Left back Danny Rose has apologised for his involvement in the post-match brawl between Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur players and staff after Monday's 2-2 draw at Stamford Bridge ended his side's title hopes.

headline.print_headline: Contrite Rose Apologises Over Chelsea-Spurs Scuffle
headline.main: Contrite Rose Apologises Over Chelsea-Spurs Scuffle

snippet: Left back Danny Rose has apologised for his involvement in the post-match brawl between Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur players and staff after Monday's 2-2 draw at Stamford Bridge ended his side's title hopes....
